DOC.brief_summary: This is a data collection study with the purpose of capturing dosing and treatment outcome data in subjects with severe congenital protein C deficiency who were treated with protein C concentrate under an Emergency Use Investigational New Drug Application (IND).
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Study to Capture Dosing and Treatment Outcome Data in Subjects With Severe Congenital Protein C Deficiency Who Were Treated With Protein C Concentrate Under an Emergency Use IND
DOC.criteria: Subject treated with protein C concentrate under a Baxter Healthcare Corporation Emergency Use IND Subject with diagnosis of severe congenital protein C deficiency Subject or parent/legally authorized representative has provided written informed consent
